AddCustomRoutingEndpoints.name: AddCustomRoutingEndpoints
AddCustomRoutingEndpoints.description:
Grants permission to add a virtual private cloud (VPC) subnet endpoint to a custom
                                                routing accelerator endpoint group.

AdvertiseByoipCidr.name: AdvertiseByoipCidr
AdvertiseByoipCidr.description:
Grants permission to advertises an IPv4 address range that is provisioned for use
                                                with your accelerator through bring your own IP addresses (BYOIP).

AllowCustomRoutingTraffic.name: AllowCustomRoutingTraffic
AllowCustomRoutingTraffic.description:
Grants permission to allows custom routing of user traffic to a private destination
                                                IP:PORT in a specific VPC subnet.

CreateAccelerator.name: CreateAccelerator
CreateAccelerator.description: Grants permission to create a standard accelerator.

CreateCustomRoutingAccelerator.name: CreateCustomRoutingAccelerator
CreateCustomRoutingAccelerator.description: Grants permission to create a Custom Routing accelerator

CreateCustomRoutingEndpointGroup.name: CreateCustomRoutingEndpointGroup
CreateCustomRoutingEndpointGroup.description:
Grants permission to create an endpoint group for the specified listener for a custom
                                                routing accelerator.

CreateCustomRoutingListener.name: CreateCustomRoutingListener
CreateCustomRoutingListener.description:
Grants permission to create a listener to process inbound connections from clients
                                                to a custom routing accelerator.

CreateEndpointGroup.name: CreateEndpointGroup
CreateEndpointGroup.description: Grants permission to add an endpoint group to a standard accelerator listener.

CreateListener.name: CreateListener
CreateListener.description: Grants permission to add a listener to a standard accelerator.

DeleteAccelerator.name: DeleteAccelerator
DeleteAccelerator.description: Grants permission to delete a standard accelerator.

DeleteCustomRoutingAccelerator.name: DeleteCustomRoutingAccelerator
DeleteCustomRoutingAccelerator.description: Grants permission to delete a custom routing accelerator.

DeleteCustomRoutingEndpointGroup.name: DeleteCustomRoutingEndpointGroup
DeleteCustomRoutingEndpointGroup.description:
Grants permission to delete an endpoint group from a listener for a custom routing
                                                accelerator.

DeleteCustomRoutingListener.name: DeleteCustomRoutingListener
DeleteCustomRoutingListener.description: Grants permission to delete a listener for a custom routing accelerator.

DeleteEndpointGroup.name: DeleteEndpointGroup
DeleteEndpointGroup.description:
Grants permission to delete an endpoint group associated with a standard accelerator
                                                listener.

DeleteListener.name: DeleteListener
DeleteListener.description: Grants permission to delete a listener from a standard accelerator.

DenyCustomRoutingTraffic.name: DenyCustomRoutingTraffic
DenyCustomRoutingTraffic.description:
Grants permission to disallows custom routing of user traffic to a private destination
                                                IP:PORT in a specific VPC subnet.

DeprovisionByoipCidr.name: DeprovisionByoipCidr
DeprovisionByoipCidr.description:
Grants permission to releases the specified address range that you provisioned for
                                                use with your accelerator through bring your own IP addresses (BYOIP).

DescribeAccelerator.name: DescribeAccelerator
DescribeAccelerator.description: Grants permissions to describe a standard accelerator.

DescribeAcceleratorAttributes.name: DescribeAcceleratorAttributes
DescribeAcceleratorAttributes.description: Grants permission to describe a standard accelerator attributes.

DescribeCustomRoutingAccelerator.name: DescribeCustomRoutingAccelerator
DescribeCustomRoutingAccelerator.description: Grants permission to describe a custom routing accelerator.

DescribeCustomRoutingAcceleratorAttribut.name: DescribeCustomRoutingAcceleratorAttributes
DescribeCustomRoutingAcceleratorAttribut.description: Grants permission to describe the attributes of a custom routing accelerator.

DescribeCustomRoutingEndpointGroup.name: DescribeCustomRoutingEndpointGroup
DescribeCustomRoutingEndpointGroup.description: Grants permission to describe an endpoint group for a custom routing accelerator.

DescribeCustomRoutingListener.name: DescribeCustomRoutingListener
DescribeCustomRoutingListener.description: Grants permission to describe a listener for a custom routing accelerator.

DescribeEndpointGroup.name: DescribeEndpointGroup
DescribeEndpointGroup.description: Grants permission to describe a standard accelerator endpoint group.

DescribeListener.name: DescribeListener
DescribeListener.description: Grants permission to describe a standard accelerator listener.

ListAccelerators.name: ListAccelerators
ListAccelerators.description: Grants permission to list all standard accelerators.

ListByoipCidrs.name: ListByoipCidrs
ListByoipCidrs.description: Grants permission to list the BYOIP cidrs.

ListCustomRoutingAccelerators.name: ListCustomRoutingAccelerators
ListCustomRoutingAccelerators.description: Grants permission to list the custom routing accelerators for an AWS account.

ListCustomRoutingEndpointGroups.name: ListCustomRoutingEndpointGroups
ListCustomRoutingEndpointGroups.description:
Grants permission to list the endpoint groups that are associated with a listener
                                                for a custom routing accelerator.

ListCustomRoutingListeners.name: ListCustomRoutingListeners
ListCustomRoutingListeners.description: Grants permission to list the listeners for a custom routing accelerator.

ListCustomRoutingPortMappings.name: ListCustomRoutingPortMappings
ListCustomRoutingPortMappings.description: Grants permission to list the port mappings for a custom routing accelerator.

ListCustomRoutingPortMappingsByDestinati.name: ListCustomRoutingPortMappingsByDestination
ListCustomRoutingPortMappingsByDestinati.description:
Grants permission to list the port mappings for a specific endpoint IP address (a
                                                destination address) in a subnet

ListEndpointGroups.name: ListEndpointGroups
ListEndpointGroups.description:
Grants permission to list all endpoint groups associated with a standard accelerator
                                                listener.

ListListeners.name: ListListeners
ListListeners.description: Grants permission to list all listeners associated with a standard accelerator.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a globalaccelerator resource.

ProvisionByoipCidr.name: ProvisionByoipCidr
ProvisionByoipCidr.description:
Grants permission to provisions an address range for use with your accelerator through
                                                bring your own IP addresses (BYOIP).

RemoveCustomRoutingEndpoints.name: RemoveCustomRoutingEndpoints
RemoveCustomRoutingEndpoints.description:
Grants permission to remove virtual private cloud (VPC) subnet endpoints from a custom
                                                routing accelerator endpoint group.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a globalaccelerator resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a globalaccelerator resource.

UpdateAccelerator.name: UpdateAccelerator
UpdateAccelerator.description: Grants permission to update a standard accelerator.

UpdateAcceleratorAttributes.name: UpdateAcceleratorAttributes
UpdateAcceleratorAttributes.description: Grants permission to update a standard accelerator attributes.

UpdateCustomRoutingAccelerator.name: UpdateCustomRoutingAccelerator
UpdateCustomRoutingAccelerator.description: Grants permission to update a custom routing accelerator.

UpdateCustomRoutingAcceleratorAttributes.name: UpdateCustomRoutingAcceleratorAttributes
UpdateCustomRoutingAcceleratorAttributes.description: Grants permission to update the attributes for a custom routing accelerator.

UpdateCustomRoutingListener.name: UpdateCustomRoutingListener
UpdateCustomRoutingListener.description: Grants permission to update a listener for a custom routing accelerator.

UpdateEndpointGroup.name: UpdateEndpointGroup
UpdateEndpointGroup.description: Grants permission to update an endpoint group on a standard accelerator listener.

UpdateListener.name: UpdateListener
UpdateListener.description: Grants permission to update a listener on a standard accelerator.

WithdrawByoipCidr.name: WithdrawByoipCidr
WithdrawByoipCidr.description: Grants permission to stops advertising a BYOIP IPv4 address.
